p: The aqueous and methanol extracts obtained from flowers, stems, and leaves of F. angulata were investigated by Faride et al. [ 31], who found IC 50 values ranged from 214 to 1606 µg/mL against the DPPH radical. Values in the range from 264 to 393 μmol of Trolox equivalent per gram of dry weight were found for F. angulata ethanol flower extract and leaf methanol extract, respectively [ 32].
